titleStmt.title: A narrative of the excommunication of Sir John Pettus of the county of Suffolk, Knight obtained against him by his lady, a Roman Catholick, and the true state of the case between them with his faithful answers to several aspersions raised against him by her, to the prepossessing the judgments of some honourable persons and others.
titleStmt.author: Pettus, John, Sir, 1613-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
